text: The 2024-25 Austrian football championship was the 114th season of the top league in Austria and the 51st under the name Bundesliga. Styria had three clubs in the league.Upper Austria, Vienna, Carinthia had two clubs. Vorarlberg, Salzburg and Tyrol had one each. The sports betting provider Admiral acted as the main sponsor. ÖFL (German) Sturm Graz was able to defend its title from the previous year. Sk Austria Klagenfurt was relegated. SV Ried was promoted. ==Mode == Each team played once at home and away against each other team. The best six teams then went into the championship group and the remaining six into the qualification group. The points from the basic round were halved and half points were rounded down. If two clubs had been tied on points at the end of the final round and one of these clubs had had half a point rounded off, that club would have been ranked higher. This was followed by a Conference League playoff for the 5th in the championship group and the 1st and 2nd in the qualification group. The winner got the last European Cup starting place. The last place in the qualifying group had to be relegated to the 2nd league. ==Table initial rounds== Pl. Name M W D L P (halfed) 1\. SK Sturm Graz 22 14 4 4 46 (23) 2\. FK Austria Wien 22 14 4 4 46 (23) 3\. FC Red Bull Salzburg 22 10 8 4 38 (19) 4\. Wolfsberger AC 22 11 3 8 36 (18) 5\. SK Rapid Wien 22 9 7 6 34 (17) 6\. FC Blau-Weiß Linz 22 10 3 9 33 (16) 7\. LASK 22 9 4 9 31 (15) 8\. TSV Hartberg 22 6 8 8 26 (13) 9\. SK Austria Klagenfurt 22 5 6 11 21 (10) 10\. WSG Tirol 22 4 7 11 19 (9) 11\. Grazer AK 22 3 7 12 16 (8) 12\. SCR Altach 22 3 7 12 16 (8) From 2021/22, if there is a tie on points, it will not be the goal difference as before, but the results of the games against each other is the first ranking criterion
